_header: He that will harken of wit
Subjects: moon, changes of; lucky and unlucky days
_description: The Days of the Mone — in 6-line stanzas

BLHar2320.First Lines: HE þat wol herkyn of witþat ys witnest in holy wrytlystenyth to me a stondeOf a stori y schal ȝow telleWhat tyme ys good to bye & sylle#8230;
BLHar2320.Last Lines: …Be þe mone a day oldeOþer ii or iii or twebelfoldeOþer how old so he beBe hyt þe iii day oþer þe ferþe#8230;
